bibl.title: The Genre of Plataea. Generic Unity in the New Simonides.
The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire
bibl.author: OBBINK, Dirk

bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper appeared as: The Hymnic Structure of the New Simonides, Arethusa 29 (1996) pp. 193-203. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 10-18 (in part. 11). - The Hymnic Structure of Plataea. - Simonides' Book. - One Poem or Many?
OBBINK Dirk, The Genre of Plataea. Generic Unity in the New Simonides.
Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire (Oxford, 2001) pp. 65-85, 1 fig.
